summary:
Rob is Master of Science (toxicology), Master of Business Administration (management systems), quality and safety expert (HVK).

Rob Ronday acts as interim QHSE manager, management consultant, auditor and trainer.  

Rob has been working for Mercedes-Benz until 1997 and for KPMG until 2006. Since 2006 Rob is self-employed and has been providing services to the following multinationals and organisations: 

3M, Abbott Laboratories, AkzoNobel, Arriva,  Asics, ASML, Aspen pharma, BMW, Canon, CBRE, Damen Shipyards, DSM, Gazprom, Johnson & Johnson, KLM / Air France, Mahle, Mercedes-Benz, Merck, NAM, Organon, OVV, Philips, Primark, Procter & Gamble, Russal, Sara Lee, Schering-Plough, Sodexo, Tata Steel, Volkswagen, Vopak, Wolters Kluwer, to the National Transportation & Safety Board, to several Dutch Ministries and to the European Union.

His specialty is to reduce risks and to ensure compliance in strictly regulated industry sectors.

His regional experience: Europe, USA, China.

Rob is accepted member of the Institute of Internal Auditors (IIA).

education.degree_name: University of Leuven (B) - Preventieadviseur PA II (MVK) (certified Health & Safety professional)

education.field_of_study: Management systems, risk management, regulatory compliance.

courses.name: BREEAM assessment tool on sustainable buildings
Quality EU MDR - ISO 13485 update to version 2016  (Medical devices - QMS)
Quality Lean Six Sigma yellow belt certified
Safety for Operational Supervisors (in Dutch: VCA-VOL).
Training Good Manufacturing Practice GMP basis
University of Leuven (B) - H&S expert - Preventieadviseur PA II (MVK)

profile_positions.description:
Focal sectors:
-Pharmaceutical & medical
-(Petro-)chemical
-Transport (automotive, maritime)
-Integrated Facility Management (technical maintenance, projects, cleaning, food).

Main activities:

Quality
-Interim Quality Assurance Manager
-Quality control, Statistical Process Control (SPC); scorecards; control plans; change control; GMP-requirements related to facility management (technical, cleaning, pest control, etc.).
-Implementing ISO9001; IATF 16949; ISO 13485; ISO 37301 compliance management.

HSE:
-Interim HSE manager
-Risk Management (FMEA; RI&E; TRA; MoC)
-Machine safety assessments
-Preparing registers of ESH legal requirements
-Work permit systems
-Implementing ISO45001; VCA; ISO 14001.

Auditing:
-Quality and ESH auditing, legal compliance auditing
-Trainer on ISO 19011 (internal auditing)

Chemicals management:
-Exposure risk assessment
-Chemicals storage
-SDS 
-EU REACH Regulation implementation and dossier submission.

References:
3M, Abbott Laboratories, Air France-KLM, AkzoNobel, Alliander, Arriva, Asics, ASML, Aspen, BASF, BMW, CBRE, DaimlerChrysler, Damen Shipyards, DSM, Gazprom, Ionbond, Johnson & Johnson, KPN, Mahle, Merck/MSD, NEN, Organon, Philips, Primark, Procter & Gamble, Redevco, Shell, Schering-Plough, Schunk Xycarb, Sodexo, Tata Steel, Volkswagen, Vopak, Wolters Kluwer, several Dutch Ministeries and the European Union.
profile_positions.title: Interim manager, management consultant, auditor, trainer

profile_positions.location: JnJ: Leiden / Amersfoort / Breda. KLM: Schiphol. Shell: The Hague. Netherlands.
profile_positions.description:
Sector: Integrated facility management services (technical services, building & construction projects, cleaning, food)

Responsibilities: 

JnJ account: 
Audit and improve the contractor management (PtW) process and asset management process in order to reach compliance with regulations, good industry practices, GMP and customer requirements.

KLM account: 
Formally co-sign high risk PtWs and provide opportunities for improvement.

Shell account (HQ The Hague).
Formally co-sign high risk PtWs and provide opportunities for improvement.
profile_positions.title: QHSE compliance at Sodexo accounts: Johnson & Johnson (JnJ) / Air France KLM and Shell.

profile_positions.description:
Sector: Integrated facility management services (technical services, building & construction projects, cleaning, food)

Responsibilities: 

1) Assist at starting new services at clients.
-Shell mobilisation. NL HSSE supervisor role at: Shell HQ The Hague, Shell Energy Transition Campus (STCA) Amsterdam, NAM Assen.
-Mars mobilisation location Oud Beijerland.
-MSD mobilisation location Boxmeer (HSE & GMP).

2) Develop, maintain and internally audit management systems.
- iso14001 (certified)
- iso 45001 (certified)
- VCA (certified)
- ISO 55001 (use as a guidance)

3) Perform RI&Es at major technical accounts.
- Coca Cola (2 locations)
- Hitachi (2 locations)
- NXP 
- KLM
- Nokia
- Microsoft (2 locations)
- Shell (3 locations)
- J&J.

4) Investigate significant QHSE incidents.
Shell:
-Investigation and root cause analysis of a serious non-compliance with good industry practices and customer requirements.
KLM:
-Investigation into chromium VI exposure
-Set-up medical surveillance program
-Lost Time Injury incident (2x)
NXP:
-Lost Time Injury incident
JnJ:
-Incident with Asset management not meeting client expectations.
profile_positions.title: Adviser to the Sodexo QHSE dept. (ad interim)

profile_positions.description:

US multinational conglomerate operating in the fields of industry, worker safety, healthcare, and consumer goods

Responsibilities

Achievements

profile_positions.title: Regulatory compliance auditor (through Convergence Consulting)

-NRG - nuclear service provider (Petten, NL, 5x)
-Erasmus MC -  Research, education, and healthcare (Rotterdam, NL)

profile_positions.description: Responsible for EHS (environment, work permit system, incident investigation), GxP FM compliance and compliance management system (ISO 37301).  Local CBRE Management Team member.
profile_positions.title: QESH compliance lead at MSD Haarlem (ad interim)

profile_positions.description:
Sector: Medical - pharma.
Lilly, headquartered in the US, develops and delivers medicines and diagnostics.

Responsibilities
> Auditing the affiliate office located in Utrecht (NL) on compliance to Corporate standards and local and EU legislation; acting as co-auditor.

Achievements
	> Performed a multi-day audit on BMS head office in Utrecht.
profile_positions.title: Corporate HSE compliance auditor (through Convergence Consulting)

profile_positions.description:
Sector: Medical - pharma.
Abbott Laboratories is a US headquartered health care company that has a broad range of branded generic pharmaceuticals, vaccines, medical devices, diagnostics, and nutrition products.

Responsibilities
	> Auditing Dutch Abbott sites on compliance with Abbott and OSHA standards and local and EU (mainly environment, health, biosafety and safety) legal requirements.

Achievements
> Acted as regulatory compliance auditor during an ISO certification audit at the Zwolle  manufacturing site.
> Performed several multi-day audits on Abbott sites: Olst, Groningen, Heerlen and Breda during the period indicated (above).
> Audited chemicals- and exposure-management, biosafety / lab. safety, workplace- and electrical safety.
profile_positions.title: Regulatory compliance auditor (through Convergence Consulting)

profile_positions.description:
Sector: Medical - pharma.
Merck is a global top-ten healthcare company that discovers, develops, manufactures and markets pharmaceutical products and vaccines to improve human and animal health.

Responsibilities
> Auditing Dutch Merck sites on compliance with Corporate and OSHA standards and local and EU (mainly environment, health, biosafety and safety) legal requirements over a period of 6+ years.

Achievements
	> Performed 6 multi-day audits on Merck sites in Oss (3x), Haarlem (2x) and Boxmeer (3x) during the period indicated (above).
profile_positions.title: Regulatory compliance auditor (through Convergence Consulting)

profile_positions.description:
Sector: Chemical & Pharmaceutical.
Aspen Oss specializes in the manufacture of complex pharmaceutical active substances. 
The Oss sites are formally indicated as a Major Hazard ('SEVESO') sites. 

Responsibilities
> Periodically evaluated 2 Aspen sites on compliance to Corporate standards and local and EU EHS legislation during the period indicated (above).
> Contracted by KPMG and Young & Partners

Achievements
> Covered chemicals management, 'BRZO', biosafety & lab safety, exposure assessments, REACH and CLP.
> Enabled Aspen Oss to improve EHS regulatory compliance performance.
profile_positions.title: Auditor 'EHS regulatory compliance' (intermittent)

profile_positions.description:
Sector: Semi-conductor - automotive.
Xycarb Ceramics, part of the Schunk Group and headquartered in the Eindhoven area (NL), is an Industry Leading Technology Company providing advanced technical consumable parts for the Semiconductor,- LED,- and Solar Wafer Processing Industries.

Interim Quality Assurance Management was provided for a period of 1.5 year. Assignment was to lead a team of Quality Engineers and to develop and implement plans to further improve the Quality function on customer complaint handling, 8D reporting, process control (KPI development, FMEA, SPC, control plans) and to enhance continual improvement regarding the ISO 9001 and IATF 16949 international standards and EHS legislation.
profile_positions.title: Quality Assurance Manager - ad interim
